repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
We accidentally excluded some checks due to a missing list comma in the config file.

Probably worth keeping in separate commits rather than squashing the PR.

commit.message: Use the simpler .format() instead of the more verbose %-formatting with string escapes to generate the pickle code fragments.
Enable some code style checks that were accidentally disabled.
CI: Enable many code style checks for the test files that are easy to enable without making too many changes.
CI: Enable many code style checks for non-Python source files that are easy to enable without making too many changes.
Test runner: Exclude some error tests from code style checks.
Test runner: Avoid building intermediate lists when collecting file list for the code style checks.

milestone.description: First feature release after the cleanup releases 3.0 and 3.1.

title: Enable more code style checks also for non-Python files.
